name: RefreshIndicator
desc: A widget that supports the Material "swipe to refresh" idiom.

fields.name: child
fields.desc: The widget below this widget in the tree.

fields.name: displacement
fields.desc: The distance from the child's top or bottom [edgeOffset] where the refresh indicator will settle. During the drag that exposes the refresh indicator, its actual displacement may significantly exceed this value.

fields.name: edgeOffset
fields.desc: The offset where [RefreshProgressIndicator] starts to appear on drag start.

fields.name: onRefresh
fields.desc: A function that's called when the user has dragged the refresh indicator far enough to demonstrate that they want the app to refresh. The returned [Future] must complete when the refresh operation is finished.

fields.name: onStatusChange
fields.desc: Called to get the current status of the [RefreshIndicator] to update the UI as needed. This is an optional parameter, used to fine tune app cases.

fields.name: color
fields.desc: The progress indicator's foreground color. The current theme's [ColorScheme.primary] by default.

fields.name: backgroundColor
fields.desc: The progress indicator's background color. The current theme's [ThemeData.canvasColor] by default.

fields.name: notificationPredicate
fields.desc: A check that specifies whether a [ScrollNotification] should be handled by this widget.

fields.name: triggerMode
fields.desc: Defines how this [RefreshIndicator] can be triggered when users overscroll.

fields.name: elevation
fields.desc: Defines the elevation of the underlying [RefreshIndicator].
